Presentment.definition: the act of presenting to an authority a formal statement of a matter to be dealt with ;specif

1.definition: the act of presenting to an authority a formal statement of a matter to be dealt withthe notice or accusation of an offense by a grand jury on the initiative of the jury members or on the basis of their own knowledge without a bill of indictment laid before them

2.definition: the act of producing or offering at the proper place and time a document (as a negotiable instrument) that calls for acceptance and payment by anothera demand for payment of an instrument upon a party liable for payment on behalf of the holder
